name: Jama Surya Teja
title: Full Stack Developer
abouttext:
Hi there! üëã I'm Surya.

I'm a Full Stack Developer with 2+ years of experience in building scalable and high-performance applications. I specialize in Micro-Frontend architecture, React, Angular, Redux, NgRx, and RxJS delivering seamless user experiences.
My expertise extends to real-time updates (Server-Sent Events), optimizing application performance, and backend development with Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and MySQL.
I thrive in fast-paced environments, collaborating with cross-functional teams to drive innovation and efficiency.

Key Achievements
- Engineered a Hybrid Micro-Frontend architecture using Module Federation, reducing UI
redevelopment by 80% and improving cross-framework compatibility.
- Enhanced client data refresh rates by 46% through Server-Sent Events (SSE), minimizing server
polling and improving real-time performance.
- Optimized application state management with Redux and NgRx, ensuring better data consistency
and smoother user experiences.
- Boosted page loading speeds by 30% by leveraging modern frontend technologies like React 18,
Angular 15+, and Material-UI.
- Improved application responsiveness by 67.6% using RxJS, enhancing asynchronous data
handling.
- Led backend development with Node.js and Express.js, building robust APIs to support dynamic
frontend functionalities.
- Mentored junior developers, conducted code reviews, and championed best practices to maintain
high-quality codebases.

I aim to contribute to innovative projects that push the boundaries of performance, scalability, and user experience. Let‚Äôs connect and build something amazing!

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology - BTech, Computer Science and Engineering
Class 11 and 12 - Maths, Physics and Chemistry

certifications.name: Programming for Everybody (Getting Started with Python)

projects.title: Secure pass ‚Äì safe storage and password manager based on cryptanalysis
projects.description: Built a Mobile app to store passwords in the local Database instead of Kaspersky. Enhanced security using Argon2id algorithm by providing a balanced approach to resisting both side - channel and GPU - based attacks. Reduced the RAM requirements by 32%

projects.title: Expense Tracker
projects.description: Developed an application to maintain and manage user's expenses. Integrated a feature to check the activity status. Enhancements : Filter functions, Chat assistant, Info-graphics, A

content: Would always and will count Surya for his humility, loyalty, and technical expertise. He is always respectful and approachable, making him a great team player. His loyalty to friends, colleagues, and commitments is admirable, and he can always be counted on.

One of his most outstanding qualities is his genuine intention to help others. Whether assisting with technical challenges or offering support, he is always willing to lend a hand without hesitation. His kindness and willingness to share knowledge make him a valued friend.

In addition to his strong character, Surya is highly skilled in his field. He has a sharp problem-solving mindset and adapts quickly to challenges. I truly believe that he will make a positive impact wherever he goes.

 Here's to more success together! üöÄ #SuperStar #TeamRecognition #Grateful

awards.title: Star of the Month
awards.description:
üåü Recipient of the 'Star of the Month Award üåü 
 Thrilled to share that I have been honored with the esteemed 'Star of the Month' award for my exceptional contributions and dedication to developing a project. This recognition reflects my efforts and the amazing teamwork and support within our organization. 
 I thank my colleagues, mentors, and everyone who believed in me, and this isn't possible without the invaluable support of my exceptional team and the continuous encouragement from each of you. Your guidance and encouragement have been instrumental in my journey.
